title: DEBATE - IT’S DEBATABLE
description: Raise your voice and defend your stance. Rhetoric at its finest, where words become weapons. Swoop the field and make your voice heard.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
rules: Each team can have a maximum of 3 members.
English should be the only medium of communication.
Topics will be provided on the spot.
Participants will be given 3 minutes to prepare, on the topic specified.
Usage of abusive words is not permitted.
Participants are not allowed to cross-talk.
Offending your opponent personally must be strictly avoided.
